October 9, 2024 - Launched in 2007, Amazon Vine is an internal service of Amazon.com that allows manufacturers and publishers to receive reviews for their products on Amazon. Companies pay a fee to Amazon and provide products for review. The products are then passed to Amazon reviewers, who can publish a review.

t: Amazon vine review has been removed
s: Last month, I wanted to add a new variant. Maybe due to operational reasons, a new link was created. Later, after merging, it was placed under the same link. The Amazon vine review originally existed, but on April 9th, I found that my vine review was gone. This review came from a Vine user.
